nodes.text: The Nationalist Army was the military of the Jabiimi Nationalists. Their military forces in the Clone Wars included the Nimbus commandos, tanks, various Confederate battle droids, and a genetically-engineered virus. In the time of the Galactic Empire, they used stormtroopers, All Terrain Scout Transports, All Terrain Armored Transports, Juggernauts, and TIE/LN starfighters.
